SEARCH
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.application.controller

Class RegisterSkillController

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.application.controller.RegisterSkillController
public class RegisterSkillController extends Object
Controller class for registering skills. Provides methods to interact with the skill repository and to register new skills.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    RegisterSkillController()
    Constructs a new RegisterSkillController object.

    Constructs a new RegisterSkillController object with a specified skill repository.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegisterSkillController

      public RegisterSkillController()
      Constructs a new RegisterSkillController object. Initializes the skill repository by obtaining it from the Repositories singleton instance.

    • RegisterSkillController

      public RegisterSkillController(SkillRepository skillRepository)
      Constructs a new RegisterSkillController object with a specified skill repository.
      Parameters:
      skillRepository - The skill repository to be used by the controller.

  • Method Details

    • getSkills

      public List<Skill> getSkills()
      Retrieves the list of skills from the skill repository.
      Returns:
      The list of skills.

    • registerSkill

      public Skill registerSkill(String name)
      Registers a new skill with the given name. Validates the input name and adds the skill to the repository.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the skill to be registered.
      Returns:
      The newly created skill.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the name is null or empty.
